moves.1. e4 e6 2. d4 d5 3. Bd3 dxe4 4. Bxe4: You must admit, my style is weird :)
moves.4... Nf6 5. Qd3 Nxe4 6. Qxe4 Bd6 7. b3 O: Oh, look, the king is ready for checkmate, fastest attack available is by queen protected by the knight. We should try this beginner move.
moves.8. Nf3 Re8 9. Ng5 Bb4+: Wrong move I guess. He should have protected his king.
moves.10. c3 Ba5:
Still no checkmate since the king can escape on f8, we need a bishop there.
- Bishooop, are you ready?
moves.11... Bxc3+:
But wait, I'm under attack!
I can solve this very easy by taking the bishop with the knight.
BUT here comes my idea: if I take the bishop, he might see what's coming: checkmate and ruin my plans.
So I prepared a bate for him: my rook. If I give him my rook he won't hesitate to take it, and then checkmate! So I moved the king!
moves.12. Ke2 Bxa1: He took the bate :D Enjoy it!
moves.13. Qxh7#: And here I go ... I think he was surprised ;)
